game.name: Plan B from Outer Space: A Bavarian Odyssey
game.shortDescription: Escape the grasp of the Barbvarians! Plan B from Outer Space is a stellar adventure in the style of an interactive book and takes inspiration from classic science-fiction stories and Bavarian culture. Every decision will affect the outcome of your mission; to leave this strange planet unscathed!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Escape the grasp of the Barbvarians! Plan B from Outer Space is a stellar adventure in the style of an interactive book and takes inspiration from classic science-fiction stories and Bavarian culture. Every decision will affect the outcome of your mission; to leave this strange planet unscathed!

reviewHighlights.text: I played once and resulted in Ending #6. Didn't enjoy this enough to bother going through to seek out other endings. If you like a choose-your-own-adv...
